about_the_game:
[Tactical Shooting] is an exciting top-down shooting game where you will enter a complex maze full of dangers. In this game, you must not only rely on a limited field of view to explore the surrounding environment, but also always be alert to the enemies that may appear around you. Every corner can be a fight to the death, and every shot is about survival. The game offers weapon selection and customization options, allowing you to create unique weapons and equipment based on your combat style and tactical needs.

Weapon customization, build your combat partner. Players can purchase various types of weapons, from classic pistols to devastating heavy machine guns, each with its own unique purpose and tactical value. Not only that, you can also add various accessories to the weapon, such as scope, silencer, magazine expansion, etc., to improve the performance of the weapon to meet the needs of different combat scenarios.

Diversified play modes that challenge your limits. Tactical Shooting has a variety of game modes, including annihilation, collection, and survival challenges, each with its own unique rules and challenges. At the same time, the game also has different difficulty options, whether you are a new player or a veteran shooting game fan, you can find a challenge that suits your own.
